message: Let's start fair. 50/50 split seems like a good way to begin.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll increase my share slightly, but let's not get too greedy. We still have a lot of rounds to go.
You increased your share, I'll increase mine too. Time is running out!
I'm willing to go back to a 50/50 split.  We're both losing money with each round, and this seems like the fairest option.
